messages.content: You can vote for someone who will fight for a brighter future, making sure our schools and the NHS have the investment they need and bringing our country back together. Or you can choose the politics of the past with Dominic Raab and the Conservatives favored by Brexit Party Leader Nigel Farage and Donald Trump. Many Labour supporters have told me that they will lend me their support this time to beat Dominic Raab. The Green Party have also stood aside for me. So please make your vote count on the 12th December and vote for someone who represents you and your values. Vote for a brighter future.

messages.title: Dear Resident
messages.content: The last three years have seen our country plunged into an endless discussion about Brexit which has sapped time, attention, and money from issues that matter. In troubled times people need a local champion, someone who will work hard for you and ensure that your views are represented at Westminster. I have lived in Esher and Walton for many years with my husband and four children. I use the same services you do, I share your hopes and fears for the future and what it will bring for our community and our loved ones. So when you vote on the 12th December there is a simple choice.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making sure our schools and the NHS have the investment they need.
Bringing our country back together and moving forward from Brexit.
